name: Bean Collector
description:
The Boxes have stolen Bean's fruit—time to steal it back.

Bean Collector is a 2D game where the character, named Bean, has to steal their fruit back and take it back to his homeland, the Grey Land with White Floors!

Controls:

A - Left

D - Right

Space - Jump

LMB - Shoot (Just pushes boxes *very* slightly) (The game says RMB ignore it I had a typo)

Esc - pause 

Assets used:

Music - Platformer Music Pack LITE on UnityAssetStore by VOid1 Gaming

Bean (player) - Me :D

Level Art - Nature pixel art base asset FREE on UnityAssetStore  by BlackSpire

Fruit - Pixel Adventure 1 on UnityAssetStore by Pixel Frog

*Pls note that I am learning so I missed a few things out on purpose (like killing them damn boxes for stealing Bean's fruit!!!)*
